Pre-Game Insights: Ja Morant's 'Ja 2 Nightmare' sneakers were released ahead of the game against the Houston Rockets.
The sneakers feature a University Red upper with Celestial gold accents, black suede heels with zombie hands, and 'Morant' spelled out on fang-shaped jewels on the lace locks.
The sneakers are designed for stability and traction, aimed at optimum on-court performance.
Ja Morant is excited to be back after a truncated campaign last season due to a league-imposed suspension and a season-ending shoulder injury.
Morant emphasized his role as a point guard to control the game and ensure it is in their favor.
